step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
You're raising your hands well. Try to keep your elbows a little closer together as you bring them towards your forehead.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Holding steady! Maintain this position, focusing on keeping your chest open.
Smooth return to the starting position. You're doing great!
Second rep, starting strong with hands clasped in your lap.
Good movement bringing your hands up. Focus on keeping those elbows tucked in a bit more as you reach towards your forehead.
Excellent job spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Keep your head tall and avoid any forward strain.
Holding the stretch effectively. Remember to breathe and keep your posture upright.
Great job completing the second rep by returning smoothly to the start. You're showing good control.

exercise_summary: You're doing a fantastic job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! You've shown good control in bringing your hands up and spreading your elbows wide. Remember to keep your elbows close to your head in step 2 and avoid pulling forward in step 3 for even better results.
